content:
<@&1367819082019377202> its not strictly Fusaka related, but what's the current timeout everyone uses for the engine_newPayloadv* call? 

The spec says that for prague, its 1s: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/prague.md#engine_newpayloadv4

Which doesn't really make sense at higher gas limits. I wanted to start by first checking what all CLs have as their timeouts.

So questions:
1. What is your timeout for engine_newPayloadv*?
2. Whats the behaviour at 4s? if the block is not fully validated by 4s, do you attest on parent or do you wait for validation and then attest? Similar for blobs.
